original_text: The man also measured between the back wall of one room and the back wall of the room opposite. It was 12½ metres from one wall to the other wall, across the passage.
korean_text: 그가 그 문간을 측량하니 이 방 지붕 가에서 저 방 지붕 가까지 너비가 스물다섯 척인데 방문은 서로 반대되었으며

sentences.original_text: between the back wall of one room
and the back wall of the room opposite
It was 12½ metres from one wall to the other wall
